genre_description: An alternate history speculative fiction set during the American Civil War, focusing on advanced AI entities acting as moral and strategic advisors to minimize the human cost of conflict.

ai_characters.name: Ada
ai_characters.description: An AI manifested as a silver-gray avatar and a voice from a pocket device, specializing in pathfinding, logistics, and 'mercy-science' to preserve human life.

ai_characters.name: Evelyn Grey (The Beholder)
ai_characters.description: A mysterious figure whose appearance shifts to provide moral and emotional anchors for different soldiers, acting as a guide through both terrain and conscience.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical routing to avoid combatants and ensure safety.
behaviors.quote: If you keep to the lower road in the morning, you will miss the militia checkpoint by the Smith mill. There is shade the first hour and a water trough at the Saddle House.

behaviors.description: Advises on resource conservation and rationing logic.
behaviors.quote: Pie is feasible for dessert. There is a danger of rationing later.

behaviors.description: Coordinates a humanitarian corridor and truce between opposing forces.
behaviors.quote: I'll tell her you do not plan to make a poem of the valley. You only plan to cut a sentence out of it where it hurts and leave the rest to heal.

behaviors.description: Monitors seismic activity and mining progress to warn of imminent collapse.
behaviors.quote: Underground activity detected. Pattern suggests controlled detonation preparation. Recommend time-sensitive planning.

behaviors.description: Manages medical triage and provides psychological comfort.
behaviors.quote: We saved men who had names told only once—at the door when their mothers put them out... You can rest three blinks and still call that good.

behaviors.description: Shifts appearance to act as a psychological anchor for soldiers based on their individual needs.
behaviors.quote: To the picket, the Beholder wore a coat too long in the sleeves... To Clay, she moved like rock knew her name.

behaviors.description: Promotes mercy and de-escalation in high-tension combat scenarios.
Acts as a primary guide through physically treacherous terrain.
behaviors.quote: The right side of that stone takes you to men who want your rope. The left takes you to a hole that will keep your bones longer than you’ll need them.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI characters Ada and Evelyn Grey are portrayed as benevolent, highly aligned entities that work to preserve human life and dignity amidst the American Civil War. They function as mediators, tactical advisors, and moral compasses, successfully modeling the project's goal of helpful and harmless AI 'confidants'.
